def.dt: :a politically organized community or major territorial unit having a monarchical form of government headed by a king or queen
:the realm in which God's will is fulfilled
:a realm or region in which something is dominant
:an area or sphere in which one holds a preeminent position
:one of the three primary divisions into which natural objects are commonly classified compare animal kingdom mineral kingdom plant kingdom
:a major category (as Plantae or Protista) in biological taxonomy that ranks above the phylum and below the domain
:a basic group of natural objects that includes all living and extinct animals compare mineral kingdom plant kingdom
:a basic group of natural objects that includes inorganic objects compare animal kingdom plant kingdom
:a basic group of natural objects that includes all living and extinct plants compare animal kingdom mineral kingdom

svr.va: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

def.dt: country W Europe in British Isles comprising Great Britain & Northern Ireland ✽ London area 94,251 square miles (244,110 square kilometers), pop 58,789,194

svr.va: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

def.dt: kingdom in ancient Palestine comprising the lands occupied by the Hebrew people; established ab 1025 b.c.; divided ab 933 b.c. into a S kingdom (Judah) & a N kingdom (Israel)
the N portion of the Hebrew kingdom after the division ✽ Samaria
country SW Asia bordering on the Mediterranean; a republic established 1948 ✽ Jerusalem area 7993 square miles (20,782 square kilometers), pop 5,548,500 see palestine
